body: Kanishka Ratnapriya at Groundviews wonders whether Sri Lankans can create more opportunities for themselves "to establish a sustainable peace with the end of war in Sri Lanka by creating a culture of inclusiveness, equality and respect for all communities."
original_body: Kanishka Ratnapriya at Groundviews wonders whether Sri Lankans can create more opportunities for themselves "to establish a sustainable peace with the end of war in Sri Lanka by creating a culture of inclusiveness, equality and respect for all communities."
title: Sri Lanka: Homegrown Reconciliation Process

sentence: Kanishka Ratnapriya at Groundviews wonders whether Sri Lankans can create more opportunities for themselves "to establish a sustainable peace with the end of war in Sri Lanka by creating a culture of inclusiveness, equality and respect for all communities."
